Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Of course, you planned this event after all. It's truly impressive.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Everyone looks so happy. They must be cherishing these precious moments.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Whenever I see scenes like this, I can't help but think that protecting these hard-earned moments of joy is also our responsibility.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Today's experience was truly precious. Thank you, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
